name: The Situation is Escalating
description:
Defend the earth form the asteroid onslaught. Mine resources by flying by the moon (yellow) and making shields. Survive the round to upgrade yourself for the next.

Controls:

W to thrust Forward

S to thrust Backward

A and D to Rotate

Space Bar to brake and increase rotate speed

LMB to place Shield (You always place the last one)

RMB to fire Missiles(When unlocked)

G to switch to a different camera(can scroll up and down to zoom on this camera)

ESC for pause

Low Poly Earth by

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/stylized-earth-...
